details.history: The dungeon was created by a lawful neutral monk as a stronghold. Its creator was destroyed by a magical catastrophe, and the dungeon has lain empty for many centuries until recently.
details.illumination: Average (shadowy in corridors, lamps or torches in most rooms)

monster: Treasure: 2300 cp, 1600 sp, 30 gp, a bone rod engraved with arcane runes (25 gp), a stoneware cup painted with mythical imagery (25 gp), Spell Scroll (Illusory Script) (common, dmg 200), Bag of Holding (uncommon, dmg 153), Potion of Greater Healing (uncommon, dmg 187), 2 x Potion of Healing (common, dmg 187)
detail.room_features: A magical shrine in the south-west corner of the room summons an air elemental to serve whomever sacrifices a gemstone upon it (but only once), and part of the ceiling has collapsed into the room

south.desc: Stuck Stone Door (DC 20 to break; 60 hp)

hidden_treasure: Hidden (DC 15 to find) Trapped and Locked Good Wooden Chest (DC 20 to unlock, DC 20 to break; 15 hp)

Contact Poison: DC 10 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    affects each creature which touches the trigger, DC 12 save or take 2d10 damage

2200 cp, 1100 sp, 60 gp, 2 x diamond (50 gp), carnelian (50 gp), jasper (50 gp), sardonyx (50 gp), zircon (50 gp), Bag of Holding (uncommon, dmg 153), Oil of Slipperiness (uncommon, dmg 184), Potion of Fire Breath (uncommon, dmg 187), Potion of Growth (uncommon, dmg 187)
detail.room_features: A shallow pit lies in the south-west corner of the room, and a faded and torn tapestry hangs from the north wall

east.desc: Stuck Iron Door (DC 25 to break; 60 hp)

monster: Silver Dragon Wyrmling (cr 2, mm 118); deadly, 450 xp
detail.room_features: Someone has scrawled "Mind the gap" on the north wall, and an unidentifiable odor fills the room

west.desc: Secret (DC 25 to find) Locked Simple Wooden Door (DC 10 to open, DC 15 to break; 10 hp) (slides up)
west.secret: A bookcase and concealed door pivots smoothly

west.desc: Stuck Good Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 15 hp)

detail.room_features: A chute descends from the room into a magical cyst below, and a pile of rotten fruit lies in the east side of the room

north.desc: Stuck Stone Door (DC 20 to break; 60 hp)

south.desc: Secret (DC 20 to find) Stuck Strong Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 20 hp)
south.secret: The door is located above a small stone dais and concealed behind a tapestry of ghoulish carnage

west.desc: Locked Simple Wooden Door (DC 15 to open, DC 15 to break; 10 hp)

hidden_treasure: Hidden (DC 15 to find) Locked Strong Wooden Chest (DC 15 to unlock, DC 25 to break; 20 hp)

1400 cp, 900 sp, 70 gp, a bone rod engraved with draconic scales (25 gp), a copper bowl inlaid with ornate silver scrollwork (25 gp), a lacquered wooden shield brooch engraved with elven script (25 gp), a set of crystal dice (25 gp), Spell Scroll (Friends) (common, dmg 200), Potion of Climbing (common, dmg 187)

east.desc: Wooden Portcullis (lift DC 20, DC 15 to break; 30 hp)

north.desc: Stuck Good Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 15 hp)

monster: Cult Fanatic (cr 2, mm 345) and 1 x Cultist (cr 1/8, mm 345); deadly, 475 xp
Treasure: 2100 cp, 1100 sp, 70 gp, 2 x azurite (10 gp), banded agate (10 gp), blue quartz (10 gp), hematite (10 gp), lapis lazuli (10 gp), moss agate (10 gp), tiger eye (10 gp)
detail.room_features: The ceiling is covered with cracks, and a rusted chain shirt lies in the center of the room

south.desc: Stuck Simple Wooden Door (DC 10 to break; 10 hp)

west.desc: Wooden Portcullis (lift DC 20, DC 15 to break; 30 hp)

detail.room_features: Several square holes are cut into the ceiling and floor, and someone has scrawled "Trespassers will be flayed alive" in blood on the west wall

east.desc: Secret (DC 25 to find) Locked Simple Wooden Door (DC 10 to open, DC 15 to break; 10 hp)
east.secret: A bookcase and concealed door pivots smoothly

west.desc: Trapped and Locked Iron Door (DC 15 to open, DC 30 to break; 60 hp)
west.trap:
Rune of Confusion: DC 15 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    affects all targets within 10 ft., DC 15 save or become confused (phb 224) for 1d4 rounds

detail.room_features: Someone has scrawled "It's a trap" in draconic script on the north wall, and the ceiling is covered with cobwebs

east.desc: Trapped and Locked Strong Wooden Door (DC 25 to open, DC 20 to break; 20 hp)
east.trap: One-way Door: DC 10 to find, DC 15 to disable

west.desc: Secret (DC 25 to find) Locked Simple Wooden Door (DC 10 to open, DC 15 to break; 10 hp)
west.secret: A bookcase and concealed door pivots smoothly

monster: Orc (cr 1/2, mm 246) and 1 x Half-ogre (cr 1, mm 238); deadly, 300 xp
detail.room_features: Spirals of black stones cover the floor, and the walls are covered with goblin graffiti

south.desc: Trapped Iron Portcullis (DC 20 to lift, DC 25 to break; 60 hp)
south.trap: One-way Door: DC 15 to find, DC 15 to disable

west.desc: Trapped and Locked Strong Wooden Door (DC 25 to open, DC 20 to break; 20 hp)
west.trap: One-way Door: DC 10 to find, DC 15 to disable

monster: Treasure: 2700 cp, 800 sp, 60 gp, diamond (50 gp), citrine (50 gp), quartz (50 gp), star rose quartz (50 gp), Spell Scroll (Knock) (uncommon, dmg 200), Dust of Dryness (uncommon, dmg 166), Immovable Rod (uncommon, dmg 175), Potion of Fire Breath (uncommon, dmg 187)

north.desc: Stuck Simple Wooden Door (DC 10 to break; 10 hp)

west.desc: Unlocked Simple Wooden Door (10 hp) (slides to one side)

wandering_monsters.1: Mimic (cr 2, mm 220); deadly, 450 xp, wielding bizarre eldritch powers
wandering_monsters.2: 2 x Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166) and 2 x Wolf (cr 1/4, mm 341); deadly, 200 xp, searching for an object stolen from their lair
wandering_monsters.3: Silver Dragon Wyrmling (cr 2, mm 118); deadly, 450 xp, scavenging for food and treasure
wandering_monsters.4: Orog (cr 2, mm 247); deadly, 450 xp, actively patrolling their territory
wandering_monsters.5: Hobgoblin (cr 1/2, mm 186) and 2 x Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); deadly, 200 xp, wielding bizarre eldritch powers
wandering_monsters.6: Hobgoblin (cr 1/2, mm 186) and 1 x Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); medium, 150 xp, gathered around an evil shrine
